DisplayName.value: Ghussak - Normalize NPCs and Raiders Naming

Description.value: To make it easier to patch NPCs, All hirable will be: npcHirable... All foes will be: npcRaider... TODO: All friendly but non hirable (lone wolves) will be: npcSurvivor... (but this is too generic) or npcLoner... or npcLonewolf... ? ISSUE: Run the game once, it will error about entitygroups, SIGKILL it. Then at 'ZZ-010 Ghussak - Tweaks' run useDumpedXmls.sh, because modlet CSV has no option to replace (right?), only remove or add (see HelpModding.txt), and apparently, the order of the entities matter as the lower probability ones are always on the top, and CSV 'add' is append and not prepend...!
